text:
We all know Selena Gomez knows a thing about being brave and strong. Gomez recently underwent a recent kidney transplant to aid her ongoing battle with Lupus.

Last night, Gomez shared an Instagram video with her 4-year-old sister, Gracie Elliot Teefey. The two are sitting by the ocean when Gracie says, “I’m not scared.” Gomez responds by saying, “Because you are fearless, right? You’re not scared of anything, right?” Then the two share a high five.

Sweet, right?! Wait it gets better. Gomez captioned the video with this empowering message: “I will forever let my sister know she is strong, bold, and beautiful. She will be raised to know her voice matters. She is going to understand the importance behind being a leader and inspire others by her truth.”

Watch the empowering video here.
title: Watch Selena Gomez Give an Empowering Message to Little Sister
